Class Dispatch

java.lang.Object
  edu.psu.compbio.seqcode.gse.projects.readdb.Dispatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Dispatch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Dispatch is a thread that manages the WorkerThreads and assigns WorkerThreads to ServerTasks.

Method Detail

addWork

public void addWork(ServerTask s)
Add a new ServerTask to the set of tasks that will be run. Called by Server when it accepts a new connection.

freeThread

public void freeThread(WorkerThread t,
                       ServerTask s)
called by WorkerThread when it's finished with a ServerTask. WorkerThread has called the run method(), so getting to this point means that the run method returned. The run() method should not throw any exceptions.

run

public void run()
our main loop. work through the tasks, seeing who appears to have input
